---
title: "diff"
output: html_document
---

Here I plot the top 10 examples as quantified by difference in mean brain raw z statistic and mean 'other' raw z statistic.

```{r echo=FALSE}
maxz=read.table("../Data/maxz.txt")
brainmean=apply(maxz,1,function(x){mean(x[7:16])})
othermean=apply(maxz,1,function(x){mean(x[-c(7:16)])})
diff=abs(brainmean-othermean)
table=cbind(brainmean,othermean,diff)
head(table[order(table[,"diff"],decreasing=T),])

index=order(table[,"diff"],decreasing=T)
goodexamples=index[1:10]
```


```{r, echo=FALSE}
for(i in goodexamples){
  barplot(as.matrix(maxz[i,]),las=2,cex.names=0.5,main=rownames(maxz)[i])
}
```
